#id=1
#text=Last night , I decided to take a bath .
#id=2
#text=I usually take a shower instead , but my muscles felt sore and I thought I could use a bath with some epsom salt .
#id=3
#text=The epsom salt bath is really good at soothing sore muscles , plus it is very relaxing .
#id=4
#text=I ran a very hot bath and poured some epsom salt in so it could dissolve .
#id=5
#text=While the bath was running , I grabbed a towel and a book I was reading .
#id=6
#text=I set it all up next to the tub and undressed .
#id=7
#text=I slid into the hot water and felt the salt granules prickling my skin , as my muscles finally relaxed .
#id=8
#text=After some time , the water cooled , so I added some more hot water .
#id=9
#text=I stayed in the bathtub for about 45 minutes , until my muscles felt better .
#text=When I was finally done , I drained the cooled water , toweled off , and got dressed .
